definitions.definition: An extended narrative poem in elevated or dignified language, celebrating the feats of a deity, demigod (heroic epic), other legend or traditional hero .
examples: The Icelandic epic took all night to recite.

definitions.definition: A series of events considered appropriate to an epic.
examples: The book was an epic in four volumes.

definitions.definition: A large or extended user story .

main_definition: An extended narrative poem in elevated or dignified language, celebrating the feats of a deity, demigod (heroic epic), other legend or traditional hero .
secondary_definitions: A series of events considered appropriate to an epic.
( software engineering ) A large or extended user story .
